channel.title: java on Fahim Salam Chowdhury

item.title: Optional in Java
item.description: Java 8 has some cool features introduced on it’s release, for example, lamda, method reference etc. One of the major features is Optional. Today, we will discuss what optional is, why it is introduced & basic use case of it. The Billion Dollar Mistake Tony Hoare, developer of quicksort algorithm, invented null reference in 1965. In 2009, he described it as a Billion Dollar Mistake & apologized for inventing it. Now what is Null Reference & why is it called The Billion Dollar Mistake?
